title: Photocatalysis for Organic Synthesis
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Our work has contributed significantly to the use of photocatalysis as a tool for promoting photocatalytic processes. In particular, the use of a photocatalyst-coated nmr tube has helped speed up the assessment time and enabled rapid reaction screening. Chemicals Economic
findingsText: Coating an nmr tube with a highly active photocatalyst has enabled us to study a wide range of photocatalytic reactions both in and ex situ. The rapid screening process developed in our project is likely to transform screening procedures for photocatalysed organic synthetic reactions as well as mechanistic studies of such. Chemicals
